job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.
job_details.full_text:
Staff AI Compiler Engineer

As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes compiler development, optimization for hardware, and supporting various AI workloads including generative AI. While it involves software development and MLOps, the core focus on compiler architecture and hardware-aware transformations aligns more closely with the specialized nature of an ML Engineer focused on the underlying systems that run models, rather than building user-facing GenAI applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the design, architecture, and development of software components (compiler and SDK) which are core to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.
job_tasks.justification: Compiler optimizations and hardware-aware transformations are directly related to making machine learning models run efficiently on specific hardware, which falls under the broader umbrella of adapting and optimizing models.

job_tasks.phrase: Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compiler support for various AI workloads, including generative AI, directly relates to the application and adaptation of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.
job_tasks.justification: Aligning technical strategy with broader goals and optimizing the software stack for performance and scalability requires understanding the business objectives and how the technology serves them.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.
job_tasks.justification: Overseeing and improving a 'compilation pipeline' for performance and accuracy is analogous to managing and optimizing an MLOps pipeline for model deployment and performance.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on testing methodologies for compilers is a crucial part of ensuring the reliability and quality of the production system, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects.
job_tasks.justification: Driving technical direction, solving complex problems, and setting priorities indicates a proactive, ownership-driven approach.
This phrase directly indicates a need for strong problem-solving skills to tackle challenging and undefined issues.
Explicitly states the need for collaboration with different teams.
Driving technical direction implies taking initiative and ownership of the technological path forward.
Setting priorities for projects demonstrates ownership and a focus on impactful outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring, guiding, and being a partner to colleagues are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform
job_tasks.justification: Working with upcoming generations of technology implies a need to learn and adapt to new platforms and systems.

technologies.justification: Mentioned as a workload the compiler needs to support.
Compilers are fundamental tools for building and running neural networks, aligning with data modeling technologies.
